publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1609.1 Mr John Swinney: Working together for Scotland: a Programme for Governmentâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-1609) in the name of Henry McLeish, leave out from "endorses" to end and insert "condemns the use of valuable Parliamentary time and public resources for an exercise in spin and calls for the Parliament to take on the powers of a normal Parliament which would enable it to use all of the resources of Scotland to address the social and economic priorities determined by the people of Scotland." Supported by: Brian Adam*
